content.raw:
cool, on windows I got as far as the jenkins build you posted. I am still amazed by the number of warnings that this small library is able to generate.

on ubuntu I had to add  `IGNITION_VISIBLE` to a few classes to make the linker happy. I did them in [win_ian](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/commits/41aa741217ad6d9d98c5affd1fb7e48cb5ea199d) branch - do they look good to you?
content.html:
cool, on windows I got as far as the jenkins build you posted. I am still amazed by the number of warnings that this small library is able to generate.

on ubuntu I had to add IGNITION_VISIBLE to a few classes to make the linker happy. I did them in win_ian branch - do they look good to you?
